mapper.sql: ur.user_id as ur_user_id, ur.username as ur_username, ur.nickname as ur_nickname, ur.flag as ur_flag, ur.password as ur_password, ur.email as ur_email, ur.sex as ur_sex, ur.phone as ur_phone, ur.register_time as ur_register_time, ur.register_ip as ur_register_ip, ur.last_login_time as ur_last_login_time, ur.last_login_ip as ur_last_login_ip, ur.status as ur_status, ur.head_img as ur_head_img, ur.province as ur_province, ur.city as ur_city, ur.country as ur_country, ur.source as ur_source, ur.invite_code as ur_invite_code, ur.qr_code as ur_qr_code
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from bjwg_user ur
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into bjwg_user (username, nickname, password, email, sex, phone, register_time, register_ip, last_login_time, last_login_ip, status, head_img, province, city, country, source, invite_code, qr_code ) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{registerIp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update bjwg_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
register_ip = #{registerIp,jdbcType=BIGINT},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=TINYINT},
invite_code = #{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bjwg_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, register_ip = #{registerIp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=TINYINT}, invite_code = #{inviteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT UR.*,EP.EP_LEGALPERSON as legalperson,EP.EP_ADDRESS as address,EP.BUSINESS_LICENSE as businessLicense FROM bjwg_user UR INNER JOIN bjwg_epuser EP ON UR.USER_ID = EP.USER_ID where UR.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select count(*) from bjwg_freinds where my_user_id=#{userId} and status=1
